ModMetaData.name: TI - Less Than Lethal
ModMetaData.author: JamieWx
ModMetaData.description: Adds a tazer capable of incapacitating targets safely. Adds a stun baton, capable of incapacitating targets on contact. Adds a blow gun, capable of poisoning targets, incapacitating them after a short period of time. Adds henbane, a farmable plant used for the production of blow guns.
